Package org.sonarsource.plugins.rtechnicaldebt.measures

Class RMetrics

java.lang.Object
org.sonarsource.plugins.rtechnicaldebt.measures.RMetrics
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.sonar.api.measures.Metrics
public class RMetrics extends Object implements org.sonar.api.measures.Metrics
Author:
Pranav Chandramouli, University of Saskatchewan Supervised by Dr. Melina Vidoni and Dr. Zadia Codabux Definition of all metrics for R. At present, these are all relatively bare-bones. More detail can be added to these metrics as we understand these measures better.

  • Field Details

    • CATEGORY_SIZE

      public static String CATEGORY_SIZE
      Set up 5 Categories, known in SonarQube as Domains. Given conspicuous names to help separate them from the default SonarQube metrics.
